sentences.en: According to Administrative Law, the administrative litigation can't apply intermediation, but the administrative indemnity can.
sentences.cn: 根据《行政诉讼法》的规定, 行政诉讼不适用调解, 行政赔偿可以适用调解.

sentences.en: However, as outside investor, the interest of financial intermediation is violated by inside manager.
sentences.cn: 而金融中介作为外部投资者, 其投资权益受到了企业内部经营者的侵害.

sentences.en: Intermediation is automated through technologies such as groupware, intranets, workflow and document management systems.
sentences.cn: 通过诸如群件 、 内部网 、 工作流和文档管理系统等技术,中间层实现了自动化.

sentences.en: One of the dispute - solving ways consists of intermediation and reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 其中“合意”解决纠纷的方式又包含调解与和解.

sentences.en: The financial intermediation for the project, planning, implementation, provide a solid and reliable technical support.
sentences.cn: 为项目的资金融通 、 规划 、 实施, 提供坚实可靠的技术后盾.

sentences.en: The four basic functions of knowledge management are externalization, internalization, intermediation and cognition.
sentences.cn: 知识管理的四项基本功能是:外部化 、 内部化 、 中间层和认知.

sentences.en: This rapid growth in the sector did not improve the quality of financial intermediation.
sentences.cn: 银行业的高速增长并未改善金融中介的质量.

sentences.en: With the development of information technology, peasant intermediation will become more flexible , changeable and intangible.
sentences.cn: 随着信息技术的发展, 农民中介组织将向网络化、虚拟化 、 柔性化方向转变.

words.tran_cn: 中间的；对话的；对话体的
中间人；仲裁者；调解者；媒介物
调解；仲裁；调停；作中间人
